sentences.en: By the time boys reach your age they usually have learned to dissemble for rich uncles.
sentences.cn: 象你那样年纪的孩子都会对有钱的舅舅假装亲热.

sentences.en: Easy to assemble or dissemble for brake lever is considerable to bicycle assembly or repair.
sentences.cn: 刹车把手的组装与拆卸之方便性对自行车之组装与维修有很大的影响.

sentences.en: Henry was not slow to dissemble when it served his purposes.
sentences.cn: 在需要时，亨利会毫不迟疑地伪装自己。

sentences.en: I tried to dissemble an interest I didn't feel.
Perhaps it is right to dissemble your love. But - why do you kick me downstairs?
sentences.cn: 为掩饰你的爱,那也许是对的. 可是 —— 你为什么把我赶出去了 呢 ?

sentences.en: Perhaps it was right to dissemble your love.
sentences.cn: 为掩饰你的爱,那也许是对的.

sentences.en: Perhaps it was right to dissemble your love. But — why did you kick me downstairs?
sentences.cn: 为掩饰你的爱,那也许是对的. 可是——你为什么把我(从家里)赶出去了 呢 ?

sentences.en: She tried to dissemble her disappointment with a joke.
sentences.cn: 她用笑话掩盖她的失望.

sentences.en: They only call it rubbish to dissemble their real motives.
sentences.cn: 他们把它说得分文不值就是为了掩盖自己的真正动机.

sentences.en: Theycall it rubbish to dissemble their real motives.
sentences.cn: 他们把它说得分文不值掩盖自己的真正动机.

sentences.en: Who knows not dissemble knows not how to live.
sentences.cn: 背要非常小心,天知道它会怎样,能不能扛住.

sentences.en: Who knows not how to dissemble knows not how to live.
sentences.cn: 掩饰感情全不会,怎样生活必不知.

trans.tran_en: to hide your true feelings, thoughts etc
